item.title: ACV to Report Second Quarter 2021 Financial Results on August 11, 2021
item.description: Presenting at Canaccord Genuity Growth Conference on August 12, 2021 BUFFALO, N.Y., July 26, 2021 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ACV (Nasdaq: ACVA), announced today that it will report second quarter 2021 financial results following the close of market on Wednesday, August 11, 2021.

item.title: ACV Launches New Financing Offerings for Used Car Dealers Through ACV Capital

item.dc:creator: ACV Auctions Inc. News Releases

item.description: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE June 1, 2021 ACV Launches PRIVATE MARKETPLACES for Dealership Groups & Commercial Partners to Host Closed Digital Auctions Offers customizable options for moving vehicles within specified dealership networks BUFFALO, N.Y.

item.title: ACV Announces First Quarter 2021 Results
item.description: Initiates Second Quarter and Full Year 2021 Guidance First quarter total revenue of $69.1 million, up 64% year over year GAAP net loss of $17.4 million, compared to GAAP net loss of $27.5 million in first quarter 2020 Adjusted EBITDA loss of $12.4 million, compared to Adjusted EBITDA loss of $24.4
item.dc:creator: ACV Auctions Inc. News Releases
